summary:
Very Easy To use Papyrus Script Editor. I designed this Papyrus editor to be user friendly and enableing less typing with the insert menus that insert events, functions and properties.

To PROPERLY exit the program and end the process press File==>Exit or the shortcut (Ctrl+Shift+E)

VERSION 2 RELEASEd
descriptionHtml:
[size=5][url=http://darkwolfmodding.wix.com/darkwolfmodding]Check out my website[/url]
Contact Me:
[Twitter] (I will post my status on mod updates and upcoming mods here so follow me on twitter)
[url=https://twitter.com/DarkWolfModding]DarkWolfModding[/url]

I personally think this is easier to use than Notepad or Notepad ++. I will try to figure out syntax highlighting.

Change Log:
[Version 1.0]
Initial Release

[Version 2.0]
Complete UI Redesign (From scratch)

Added ability to open an existing script

Revamped "New Script" Menu

Added Script selection window

Toggleable (Show and hide) the script info section "Scriptname ScriptNameHere Extends What script does" to the new script window.

Scriptname and Extend TextBoxes are no longer read-only.

Added my Readme Generator program straight to the program that generates a text readme and can generate an html readme.

[Version 2.1]

-BugFix- Fixed the generated file not having as space in between scriptname...

-BugFix- Fixed the Open existing script main text area to be scrollable for longer scripts.

[url=http://www.creationkit.com/Category:Papyrus] Creation Kit Papyrus Reference [/url]

[color=Yellow]Lots has changed since version one so make sure to look at all the images. [/color]

Description:
Very Easy To use Papyrus Script Editor. I designed this Papyrus editor to be user friendly and enabling less typing with the insert menus that insert events, functions and properties.

To PROPERLY exit the program and end the process press File==>Exit or the shortcut (Ctrl+Shift+E)

Cant Open A Papyrus Script yet.

Uninstallation:
Remove the Papyrus Script Editor.exe from your location

Future updates:
[Version 2.5]
Will add HTML Support

[Version 3.0]
Will add a basic text and rtf editor
